definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: bind (perh. cf. As. [alāmu], almattu, fortress Dl in Zim:BP 114 & in BD Ezek.:xi; Ar. 0’alima be in pain, Aram. 0elam retain anger).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: (be bound = ) be dumb, Pf. 3 fs. [[נֶאֱלָָמָה]] Is 53:7; [[וְנֶאֱלַמְתָּ֫]] Ez Eze 3:26, etc.; Impf. 2 ms. [[תֵּאָלֵם]] Ez Eze 24:27; 3 fpl. [[תֵּאָלַמְנׇה]] Ps 31:19.—

be dumb, i.e. silent Ps 39:3 [[דוּמִיׇּה]] ´[[נ]] (‖[[הֶחֱשֵׁיתִי]]); cf. v:Ps 39:10 (‖[[לאׁ אֶפְתַּח־פִּי]]); sim. of sheep Is 53:7 (‖ id.); be dumb, i.e. unable to speak Ez Eze 3:26 (result of [[וּלְשׁוֹנְךָ אַדְבִּיק אֶל־חִכָָּךָ]]) cf. Eze 24:27 …[[יִפָּתַח פִּיךָ]] [[וּתְדַבֵּר וְלאׁ תֵאָלֵם עוֹד]]; Eze 33:22 [[וַיִּפְתַּח פִּי וְלאׁ נֶאֱלַמְתִּי עוֹד]]; also Da 10:15 (cf. v:Da 10:16); be made dumb subj. [[שִׂפְתֵי שָָׁקֶר]] lying lips Ps 31:19 (‖[[יִדְּמוּ לִשְׁאוֹל]] v:Ps 31:18).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pt. bind Ge 37:7 (E) [[מְאַלְּמִים אֲלֻמִּים]] binding sheaves.
